xx.42E90D9A: Summary_The KGB officer has a thirst for vodka and he is unlikely to drink alone.
xx.35EE3D0C: Briefing_The officer in charge has ordered airfield security to get him a bottle of vodka. He will probably offer Knight a drink as well. That is, provided he is able to drag the grandmaster away from his chess game.
xx.AB8AA8AF: Step 1_Overhear security guards talking about the vodka bottle.
xx.3283F915: Step 4_Place the vodka in the meeting room.
xx.D53BD412: Conclusion_Well done Initiate. I should say a toast is in order.

en.42E90D9A: The KGB officer has a thirst for vodka, and he is unlikely to drink alone.
en.35EE3D0C: The officer in charge has ordered airfield security to get him a bottle of vodka. He will probably offer Knight a drink as well. That is, provided he is able to drag the grandmaster away from his chess game.
en.AB8AA8AF: Overhear security guards talking about the vodka bottle
en.3283F915: Place the vodka in the meeting room
en.D53BD412: Well done, Initiate. I should say a toast is in order.

fr.42E90D9A: L'officier du KGB apprécie la vodka et il est peu probable qu'il boive seul.
fr.35EE3D0C: L'officier de service a demandé à la sécurité de l'aérodrome de lui apporter une bouteille de vodka. Il proposera probablement un verre à Knight. Du moins, s'il parvient à éloigner le grand maître de sa table d'échecs.
fr.AB8AA8AF: Écoutez les gardes parler de la bouteille de vodka
fr.3283F915: Déposez la bouteille de vodka dans la salle de réunion
fr.A23CE484: Résolvez le problème d'échecs de Jasper Knight
fr.D53BD412: Beau travail, Initié. Je lève mon verre à votre réussite.

it.42E90D9A: L'agente del KGB ha voglia di vodka ed è improbabile che berrà da solo.
it.35EE3D0C: L'ufficiale responsabile ha ordinato alla sicurezza dell'aeroporto di procurargli una bottiglia di vodka. Probabilmente ne offrirà un bicchiere a Knight. Ammesso che riesca a distogliere il maestro dalla partita a scacchi.
it.AB8AA8AF: Ascolta le guardie mentre parlano della bottiglia di vodka
it.3283F915: Posiziona la vodka nella sala riunioni
it.A23CE484: Risolvi il problema di Knight con gli scacchi
it.D53BD412: Ben fatto, recluta. La tua impresa merita un brindisi

de.42E90D9A: Der KGB-Offizier hat eine Schwäche für Wodka, und er trinkt ungern allein.
de.35EE3D0C: Der diensthabende Offizier hat eine Flasche Wodka angefordert. Vermutlich wird er Knight ebenfalls einen Drink anbieten. Natürlich nur, wenn es ihm gelingt, den Großmeister von seiner Schachpartie wegzulocken.
de.AB8AA8AF: Belauschen Sie die Wachen, die sich über den Wodka unterhalten
de.3283F915: Bringen Sie den Wodka in den Besprechungsraum
de.D53BD412: Gute Arbeit, Rekrut. Ich denke, darauf sollten wir anstoßen.

es.42E90D9A: Parece que el agente de la KGB tiene ganas de beber vodka, y no tiene pinta de que vaya a hacerlo solo.
es.35EE3D0C: El oficial al mando ha ordenado a los guardias del aeródromo que le lleven una botella de vodka. Seguramente le ofrezca un trago a Knight. Eso siempre y cuando consiga separar al gran maestro de su partida de ajedrez.
es.AB8AA8AF: Escucha la conversación de los guardias de seguridad sobre la botella de vodka
es.3283F915: Lleva el vodka a la sala de reuniones
es.A23CE484: Resuelve el problema de ajedrez de Jasper Knight
es.D53BD412: Bien hecho, iniciado. Creo que esto se merece un brindis.
